-- | Program that sends traffic through SSH tunnels on-demand
--   
@package on-demand-ssh-tunnel
@version 0.1.0.6

module Network.OnDemandSSHTunnel
data SSHTunnel
SSHTunnel :: Int -> String -> [String] -> SSHTunnel
newtype Config
Config :: [SSHTunnel] -> Config
prettyConfig :: Config -> String
setupConfiguration :: Config -> IO ()
setupOnDemandTunnel :: SSHTunnel -> IO ()
instance Show SSHTunnel
instance Read SSHTunnel
instance Generic SSHTunnel
instance Show Config
instance Read Config
instance Generic Config
instance Datatype D1SSHTunnel
instance Constructor C1_0SSHTunnel
instance Datatype D1Config
instance Constructor C1_0Config
instance Out Config
instance Out SSHTunnel
